verses.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Thank the LORD, because he is good — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Let Israel declare it: his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Let the house of Aaron declare it: his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Let them now that fear the LORD say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Let those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD declare it: his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: I called upon the LORD in distress: the LORD answered me, and set me in a large place.
verses.ct: In my desperation I cried out to the LORD, and the LORD answered me and brought me into an open place.

verses.kjv: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?
verses.ct: The LORD is with me — I will not be afraid. What can any person do to me?

verses.kjv: The LORD taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.
verses.ct: The LORD stands with me among my supporters, so I will see the downfall of those who hate me.

verses.kjv: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man.
verses.ct: Taking refuge in the LORD is far better than relying on people.

verses.kjv: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
verses.ct: Taking refuge in the LORD is far better than relying on rulers.

verses.kjv: All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD will I destroy them.
verses.ct: Every nation surrounded me, but by the name of the LORD I cut them down.

verses.kjv: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
verses.ct: They closed in on me — yes, they closed in on every side — but by the name of the LORD I cut them down.

verses.kjv: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
verses.ct: They swarmed around me like bees, but they burned out as quickly as a fire in dry thorns, because by the name of the LORD I cut them down.

verses.kjv: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the LORD helped me.
verses.ct: You pushed me hard, trying to knock me down, but the LORD came to my rescue.

verses.kjv: The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
verses.ct: The LORD is my power and my song; he has become my salvation.

verses.kjv: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
verses.ct: Shouts of joy and victory echo through the tents of the righteous: the LORD's mighty hand has done powerful things!

verses.kjv: The right hand of the LORD is exalted: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
verses.ct: The LORD's mighty hand is raised high; the LORD's mighty hand has done powerful things!

verses.kjv: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the LORD.
verses.ct: I will not die — I will live and proclaim what the LORD has done.

verses.kjv: The LORD hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
verses.ct: The LORD disciplined me severely, but he did not hand me over to death.

verses.kjv: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise the LORD:
verses.ct: Swing open the gates of righteousness for me! I will walk through them and praise the LORD.

verses.kjv: This gate of the LORD, into which the righteous shall enter.
verses.ct: This is the gate of the LORD — the righteous will enter through it.

verses.kjv: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
verses.ct: I will praise you because you heard my cry and became my salvation.

verses.kjv: The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner.
verses.ct: The stone that the builders rejected has become the most important cornerstone.

verses.kjv: This is the LORD’s doing; it is marvellous in our eyes.
verses.ct: The LORD has done this, and it is amazing to us.

verses.kjv: This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
verses.ct: This is the day the LORD has made — let us celebrate and be glad in it.

verses.kjv: Save now, I beseech thee, O LORD: O LORD, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.
verses.ct: Please save us, LORD! LORD, please grant us success!

verses.kjv: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of the LORD: we have blessed you out of the house of the LORD.
verses.ct: Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the LORD. We bless you from the house of the LORD.

verses.kjv: God is the LORD, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.
verses.ct: The LORD is God, and he has given us light. Tie the festival sacrifice with ropes and bring it to the horns of the altar.

verses.kjv: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
verses.ct: You are my God, and I will praise you. You are my God, and I will honor you.

verses.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Thank the LORD, because he is good — his mercy lasts forever.
